JUDGES: Alvina Gyulumyan;Egbert Myjer;Elisabet Fura;Josep Casadevall;Luis López Guerra
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in PERSON . He was not represented before the ORG . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , Mr PERSON , ORG Attorney - General .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE , in the context of a real estate dispute , the applicant brought an action before ORG ( PERSON sodišče v PERSON ) against J.L.
On DATE the renamed ORG ( Okrožno sodišče v PERSON ) delivered a judgment rejecting the applicant ’s claim . The applicant appealed against this judgment .
On DATE ORG ( PERSON v PERSON ) dismissed his appeal .
On DATE the applicant lodged an appeal on points of law . On DATE the appeal on points of law was partly dismissed on procedural grounds and partly rejected by ORG sodišče ) .
The applicant subsequently lodged a constitutional appeal which was dismissed by ORG ( GPE sodišče ) on DATE .
ORG decision was served on the applicant on DATE .
